title: Ticket #6234: Allow blahp to find batch system tools in the PATH
description:
The blahp's scripts require a configuration variable be set saying where the batch system's comand-line tools reside (e.g. condor_binpath). This assumes all of the tools reside in the same directory. This is not true with OSG-Connect. It includes a wrapper script for condor_submit, which resides in a directory that's earlier in the PATH than the real condor_submit binary.

We should change the blahp's scripts so that if the binpath variable for the batch system is unset, they rely on the PATH to find each command-line tool.
